audioText: Vous regretterez certainement cette décision minuscule qui aura des conséquences énormes sur votre avenir professionnel.
question: What will you regret according to the speaker?
options: A tiny decision that will have huge consequences on your professional future
A major decision that will improve your career prospects
A minor mistake that won't affect your job
An important choice that will benefit everyone
explanation: The text states 'Vous regretterez certainement cette décision minuscule qui aura des conséquences énormes sur votre avenir professionnel' - You will certainly regret this tiny decision that will have enormous consequences on your professional future. The verb 'regretterez' (will regret) and adjective 'minuscule' (tiny) describe underestimating importance.
